lines: There is only one happiness in life. To love and be loved.
author: George Sand (Amantine Aurore Lucile Dupin)

lines: Where there is love there is life.
author: Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi

lines: When the power of love overcomes the love of power the world will know peace.
author: Jimi Hendrix

lines: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
author: William Shakespeare

lines: The most important thing in the world is family and love.
author: John R. Wooden

lines: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

lines: Love is a friendship set to music.
author: Joseph Campbell

lines: If you really love something, just go ahead and do it.
author: Joshua Williams

lines: The most important thing in life is to learn how to give out love, and to let it come in.
author: Morrie Schwartz

lines: The easiest way to make an impact in your community is just to be kind.
author: Joshua Williams

lines: Kindness isn't about the thanks you get. It's about the act itself.
author: Joshua Williams

lines: We need not think alike to love alike.
author: Francis  David

lines: Love is not only something you feel, it is something you do.
author: David Wilkerson

lines: Never let a problem to be solved become more important than the person to be loved.
author: Barbara Johnson
